languages.text: "Этот старик — мутант, один из тех, кого мы искали?"
"Was that old man a mutant? One of those we were looking for?"
languages.original_text: "Этот старик — мутант, один из тех, кого мы искали?"

traits.locale_text: "Was that old man a mutant? One of those we were looking for?"
"Was that old man a mutant? One of those we were looking for?"
"Was that old man a mutant? One of those we were looking for?"
"Was that old man a mutant? One of those we were looking for?"
"Was that old man a mutant? One of those we were looking for?"
"Was that old man a mutant? One of those we were looking for?"

languages.text: «¿Era el anciano un mutante? ¿Uno de los que estaba buscando?».
languages.original_text: "Was that old man a mutant? One of those we were looking for?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Era el anciano un mutante? ¿Uno de los que estaba buscando?».

languages.text: 「あの老人は変異体か？探していた変異体のひとりだろうか？」
languages.original_text: "Was that old man a mutant? One of those we were looking for?"

traits.locale_text: 「あの老人は変異体か？探していた変異体のひとりだろうか？」

languages.text: “那个老人是变种人吗？是我们要找的那种变种人吗？”
languages.original_text: "Was that old man a mutant? One of those we were looking for?"

traits.locale_text: “那个老人是变种人吗？是我们要找的那种变种人吗？”

languages.text: "War der alte Mann ein Mutant? Einer von denen, nach denen wir suchen wollten?"
languages.original_text: "Was that old man a mutant? One of those we were looking for?"

traits.locale_text: "War der alte Mann ein Mutant? Einer von denen, nach denen wir suchen wollten?"

languages.text: « Ce vieil homme fait-il partie des mutants que nous recherchons ? »
languages.original_text: "Was that old man a mutant? One of those we were looking for?"

traits.locale_text: « Ce vieil homme fait-il partie des mutants que nous recherchons ? »

languages.text: "O ihtiyar adam, mutant mıydı? Aradıklarımızdan biri miydi?"
languages.original_text: "Was that old man a mutant? One of those we were looking for?"
